REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0839 reute d f BC-TRUST-AMERICA-<TRUS> 03-09 0050

TEXT.TITLE: TRUST AMERICA <TRUS> SETS CREDIT LINE
TEXT.BODY: Trust America Service Corp said it signed an agreement with the First Union Bank of Florida for a 35 mln dlr mortgage warehouse credit line. It said the new agreement more than doubles its previous 14 mln dlrs line of credit. Reuter
